title: Bug 125678 - The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report.
EB: The original chart instance in the report design handle is not modified after running the report. In my application, I retrieve the design-time instance of the chart and then call a method to run the report. I expect the chart to be bound with data after running the report. However, the chart remains unchanged. This functionality was working correctly until BIRT 2.0M3.
